attributes.title: Biden 2020
attributes.review:
I got this app and was instantly taken aback. If you want true and unbiased information about Donald Trump you should not be looking on app that he pays for. The tump 2020 app will feed you only lies just Fox News. Fox News is obviously a racist and homophobic news platform that can not be trusted. I can not honestly say that trump has done anything good for America.

attributes.title: They need to fix this!!!
attributes.review: My daughter downloaded this for myself and my husband. Both of our phones froze while on this app. 1 phone and maybe itâ€™s just my phone not the app, but both phones stop working? Itâ€™s the app. This needs to be fixed! It also drained my battery even after I closed the app!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support Trump and then I heard what Fox News and Facebook were saying about this app. It is a fake app used to take credit card information from hard working Americans and sell it to other countries. I am disgusts that they would let an app that takes money away from real Americans be on here!!!!!
